thread.title: French dairy firm under fire over Salmonella outbreak

title: French dairy firm under fire over Salmonella outbreak
text:
French dairy firm under fire over Salmonella outbreak 10:48pm IST - 01:23 
One of the world's biggest dairies has come under fire for its slow response to a Salmonella outbreak. French company Lactalis has promised to compensate victims of a Salmonella contamination in its baby milk. Anna Bevan reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
One of the world's biggest dairies has come under fire for its slow response to a Salmonella outbreak. French company Lactalis has promised to compensate victims of a Salmonella contamination in its baby milk. Anna Bevan reports.
